definition[0]: a sudden attack into an area that belongs to other people
example[0]: a combined British and French incursion into China in 1857
definition[1]: the sudden arrival of something or someone into a place or activity where they do not belong or have not been before, used especially to say that they are not welcome
example[1]: The media was criticized for its thoughtless incursion into the domestic grief of the family.
example[2]: the Japanese incursion into the U.S. domestic electronics market
